data.title: PACK 3 Flavours Ideal for Fresh Cheese
data.meta_description: Create a fresh cheese board with the best jams in tubes. Brie Cheese, Mascarpone, Mozzarella and Blueberry Jam or Pumpkin Jam.
data.text:
Pumpkin and Orange Jam with Rosemary and Eucalyptus Honey, Cinnamon and Almond

Excellent accompaniment to cured cheeses, Cheese from Serra da Estrela (PDO), Azeitão Cheese (PDO), Beira Baixa cottage cheese (PDO), “Leyden“ (PGI). Ideal jam toppings for crepes, waffles, crumbles, pancakes, toasts, cereals, pies and muffins and desserts.

Blackberry Extra Jam with Hazelnut and Nutmeg

Ideal to pair with Castelo Branco Fresh Cheese, “Camembert“ Cheese (PDO), Beira Baixa cottage cheese (PDO), “Manchego” cheese (PDO) .

Ideal for spreading oatmeal cookies, coconut cookies, cashew cookies, chocolate chip cookies, cereal bread, wholegrain toast, vegan cookies, and to create chocolate cream cake recipes. Perfect as a topping and filling for healthy American pancakes, oatmeal pancakes, banana pancakes, chocolate cakes, berry cakes.

Blueberry Extra Jam with Vanilla and Port Wine

Ideal to pair with Castelo Branco Fresh Cheese, Goat Cheese from “Trás-os-Montes” (PDO),Azeitão Cheese (PDO), “Camembert“ Cheese (PDO), “Gouda” cheese (PGI).

Ideal for spreading oatmeal cookies, coconut cookies, cashew cookies, chocolate chip cookies, cereal bread, wholegrain toast, vegan cookies, and to create chocolate cream cake recipes. Perfect as a topping and filling for healthy American pancakes, oatmeal pancakes, banana pancakes, chocolate cakes, berry cakes

Pumpkin and Orange Jam with Rosemary and Eucalyptus Honey, Cinnamon and Almond

Average nutritional information per 100 g / 3.53 oz: Energy 840 kJ / 201 kcal; Fats 2.0 g / 0.1 oz , of which saturated fat acids 0.2 g / 0.0 oz ; Carbohydrates 45.4 g / 1.6 oz , of which sugars 44.7 g / 1 .6 oz ; Proteins 1.1 g / 0.0 oz ; Salt 0.0 g / 0.0 oz.

Allergens: Contains almond.

Blackberry Extra Jam with Hazelnut and Nutmeg

Average nutritional information per 100 g / 3.53 oz: Energy 897 kJ / 215 kcal ; Fats 1.6 g / 0.1 oz; of which fat acids saturates 0.3 g / 0.0 oz ; Carbohydrates 50.0 g / 1.8 oz , of which sugars 43.5 g / 1.5 oz ; Proteins 1.0 g / 0.0 oz ; salt 0.1 g / 0.0 oz.

Allergens: Contains Hazelnuts.

Blueberry Extra Jam with Vanilla and Port Wine

Average nutritional information per 100 g / 3.53 oz: Energy 823 kJ / 197 kcal ; Fats 0.2 g / 0.0 oz , of which saturated fat acids 0.0 g / 0.0 oz ; Carbohydrates 49.0 g / 1.7 oz , of which sugars 45.9 g / 1.6 oz; proteins 0.1 g / 0.0 oz ; Salt 0.0g / 0.0 oz.

Allergens:Contains sulfites. May contain gluten.

Rosemary and eucalyptus honey, more aromatic than other honeys, has a light brown tone and a more open aroma and palate.

Originating in North and Central America, where it is still one of the mainstays of food, the pumpkin belongs to the same family as the melon and watermelon (cucurbits). The shape of the pumpkin is variable, but it is usually ovoid or oblong. The rind is usually orange, but it can have other colors depending on the species. The bright orange color of the pumpkin contains a high content of carotenes, particularly beta-carotene, with antioxidant action. Beta carotene is then converted into vitamin A in the body.

Almonds - Trás-os-Montes Region, Portugal.

The blackberry is a fruit of Asian origin that was later imported to Europe in the 17th century before being cultivated in other continents. Perhaps because it is a very fragile fruit, its production was largely reduced to domestic production. The blackberry (Rubus fruticosus) is the fruit (pseudoberry) of shrubs commonly known as brambles, of the Rosaceae family. Their shape gives them a very delicate texture that almost melts in the mouth. They have a sweet fragrance with a subtly acidic touch.

Nutmeg is one of the most appreciated and valued spices since antiquity for its aromatic, aphrodisiac and healing properties. The nutmeg fruit is a drupe, the size of an apricot. When it ripens, it divides and presents a seed surrounded by Nutmeg and Mace, and a lacy red layer known as “mace”. Mace is also marketed as a spice. Both nutmeg seed and mace are spices that contain many antioxidant chemical compounds known to act in disease prevention and health promotion.

The brandy produced from the best Portuguese grapes, has a unique aroma and flavor that results from the distillation of grapes from the Arinto, Periquita, Trincadeira and Fernão Pires varieties.

Blueberries grow in clusters and range in size from the equivalent of a small pea to that of a marble. They have an intense color that ranges from blue, brown and black-purple and include soft gray-white flowers that cover the surface of the berries and serve as a protective layer. The skin surrounds a semi-transparent integument that surrounds small seeds.
